If you want to authenticate, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").
info.register: You don't have an account yet? Register a new account

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 8 characters.
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 8 characters.
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.minlength: Your e-mail is required to be at least 5 characters.
email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 50 characters.

modal.delete: Are you sure you want to delete the announcement?
modal.add: Are you sure you want to add the announcement?
modal.update: Are you sure you want to update the announcement?
modal.overwrite: Are you sure you want to overwrite the last uploaded file?

notification.missed-therapy: Your recommended therapy is missed by three days.
notification.setting-deviation: You are not adherence to frequency defined in protocol.
notification.hmr-non-compliant-setting-deviation: Your expected compliant therapy is low as per recommendation

validation.minlength: This field is required to be at least {{min}} characters.
validation.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than {{max}} characters.
validation.min: This field should be more than {{min}}.
validation.max: This field cannot be more than {{max}}.
validation.number: This field should be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.

adherenceStartDate.required: Adherence score start date is required.
adherenceStartDate.future: Adherence score start date cannot be future.
adherenceStartDate.invalid: Adherence score start date is required.

ResetTo.invalid: Invalid Reset number, Please enter between 1 to 100 without decimals.

firstName.minlength: First Name is required to be at least 1 character.
firstName.maxlength: First Name cannot be longer than 50 characters.

lastName.minlength: Last Name is required to be at least 1 character.
lastName.maxlength: Last Name cannot be longer than 50 characters.

middleName.minlength: Middle Name is required to be at least 1 character.
middleName.maxlength: Middle Name cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.maxlength: E-mail cannot be longer than 100 characters.

dob.future: Date of Birth cannot be future.

address.maxlength: Address cannot be longer than 100 characters.

city.maxlength: City cannot be longer than 15 characters.

treatmentPerDay.min: Protocol Treatment per Day should be 1 to 9
treatmentPerDay.max: Protocol Treatment per Day should be 1 to 9
treatmentPerDay.invalid: Protocol Treatment per Day is invalid

minMinutesPerTreatment.min: Minimum Minutes per Treatment should be 1 to 99
minMinutesPerTreatment.max: Minimum Minutes per Treatment should be 1 to 99
minMinutesPerTreatment.invalid: Minimum Minutes per Treatment is invalid
minMinutesPerTreatment.custom-max-min: Minutes per Treatment should be between 1 to 99

maxMinutesPerTreatment.min: Maximum Minutes per Treatment should be 1 to 99
maxMinutesPerTreatment.max: Maximum Minutes per Treatment should be 1 to 99
maxMinutesPerTreatment.invalid: Maximum Minutes per Treatment is invalid

minFrequency.min: Minimum Frequency should be between 5 to 19
minFrequency.max: Minimum Frequency should be between 5 to 19

maxFrequency.min: Maximum Frequency should be between 6 to 20
maxFrequency.max: Maximum Frequency should be between 6 to 20

minPressure.min: Minimum Pressure should be between 1 to 9
minPressure.max: Minimum Pressure should be between 1 to 9

minIntensity.min: Minimum Intensity should be between 1 to 9
minIntensity.max: Minimum Intensity should be between 1 to 9

maxPressure.min: Maximum Pressure should be between 2 to 10
maxPressure.max: Maximum Pressure should be between 2 to 10

maxIntensity.min: Maximum Intensity should be between 2 to 10
maxIntensity.max: Maximum Intensity should be between 2 to 10

npiNumber.maxlength: NPI Number cannot be more than 15 characters.

clinicName.maxlength: Clinic Name cannot be longer than 50 characters.

answer.maxlength: Answer cannot be longer than 100 characters.

password.minlength: Password is required to be at least 8 character.
password.maxlength: Password cannot be longer than 50 characters.
password.pattern: Password is required to be at least 8 characters. Password should have atleast one special character, one upper case letter and one number.

currentPassword.minlength: Current password is required to be at least 8 character.
currentPassword.maxlength: Current password cannot be longer than 50 characters.
currentPassword.pattern: Current password should have atleast one special character, one upper case letter and one number.

newPassword.minlength: New password is required to be at least 8 character.
newPassword.maxlength: New password cannot be longer than 50 characters.
newPassword.pattern: New Password should have atleast one special character, one upper case letter and one number.

confirmPassword.minlength: Confirm password is required to be at least 8 character.
confirmPassword.maxlength: Confirm password cannot be longer than 50 characters.
confirmPassword.pattern: Confirm password should have atleast one special character, one upper case letter and one number.

footer.enhancingoutcomes: Enhancing outcomes for patients and their caregivers

validationkey.invalidactivationlink: This activation link is no longer valid. Our records say that you have been sent a new Activation Link. Kindly check your latest email for the details.
validationkey.contactmessage: Please contact Hill-Rom Respiratory Care Customer Support at 800-426-4224 or email HCCSWEB@Hill-Rom to resend a valid activation link.

noti_patient.miss-therapy-days-desc: You will get Notification email if you missed therapy for three or more days.
noti_patient.miss-therapy-new: You will receive a notification if you missed a day of therapy.
noti_patient.hmr-non-adher-desc: You will get Notification email if your HMR Non-Adherence is below protocol for three or more days.
noti_patient.hmr-non-adher-new: You will receive a notification if you did not complete the therapy time in your protocol.
noti_patient.setting-deviation-desc: You will get Notification email if your frequency is 15% below protocol for three or more days.
noti_patient.setting-dev-new: You will receive a notification if your frequency setting was 15% below protocol.
noti_patient.message-new: You will receive a notification if you have one or more messages in your inbox.

noti-verbiage: Turn On or Off the notification by clicking the toggle switch.
wait-for-calculation-header: Adherence re-calculation may take upto few minutes...
wait-for-calculation-text: Please wait while the system is re-calculating...
